name: Mass Shoot - Pre Alpha v0.1
description:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

They said it would be a normal deal

after a ambush and setup by the tony police department your entire gang is dead

and you are now in prison, but after a quick escape and gaining some former contacts, you're back in the game

but you aren't going back to drug running, you're joining the mass shooting market.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

CHANGE LOG

Verison 0.2 pre-alpha

Added the panic system, when a gun shot is fired civilians will randomly run around in a panic

Added some instructions on the wall 

Fixed bugs related to gunshots

KNOWN BUGS

Shooting still feels weird and clunky

Bullets go through enemys

Spamming space causes the bullet detection to mess up sometimes

Trying to make it where enemies run only in one direction instead of randomly switching

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

PRESS C TO SPAWN SOMEONE 

SPACE TO SHOOT
